sense.def:
A sensation
je to, kar zaznavamo s telesom.

seg.quote: It produces a mild burning sensation in the mouth.

sense.def:
A sensation
je tudi splošno počutje, ki ga povzroči določeno doživetje.

seg.quote: It was a strange sensation to return to the school again after so long.

sense.def:
Kadar je dogodek ali položaj
a sensation
, povzroči veliko razburjenje ali zanimanje.

seg.quote: The discovery was hailed as the scientific sensation of the century.
